archiefmat.titel: Stukken ten aanzien van de plantages 'Vredenburg' en 'Nijd en Spijt'
archiefmat.titel_eng: Documents regarding the 'Vredenburg' and 'Nijd en Spijt' plantations
archiefmat.scope: Inventory number 28 is a register of outgoing letters, sent by Charles François Miraldolle, mainly regarding the management of the plantation 'Vredenburg'. Number 31 contains documents regarding the said plantation after Mirandolle left Suriname. Number 35 is a concept for a bond worth 6,300 guilders to be payed from the proceeds of the plantation 'Nijd en Spijt'.
